categories: Category:Stormtrooper officers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Barse was a male Human who served as a stormtrooper lieutenant attached to the Imperial Army during the Galactic Civil War. As part of the Thrawn campaign, Barse served under General Freja Covell and was tasked with securing Talon Karrde's Myrkr Base, which had been abandoned in anticipation of the Imperial raid.
